Description: Prosecution  of Pearsons Glass Ltd after a roofer was fatally injured when he fell six metres through fragile asbestos cement sheets whilst working on a replacement roof. The investigation by the Health and Safety Executive found that the area accessed did not have safety nets fitted and the building occupier failed to take reasonably practicable measures to reduce the risk to those working on the roof.
Offence Date: This case did result from the investigation of a fatality
